thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 13 of 97
thread.title: Ken Collinson

author: Ken Collinson
title: Ken Collinson
text: Ordered a book from Anybook Ltd only to get a email which I didn't see untill it was to late asking for £2 due to extra postage it was to late to pay and money was refunded. So I re ordered the book which the price had gone up £2 which I expected due to postage however I then got the same e mail asking for another £2 postage so I cancelled the order and got the book from Amazon marketplace I won't use Anybook again
